item.title: Shreya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
Shreya add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion'." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Only a man who knows what it is like to be defeated can reach down to the bottom of his soul and come up with the extra ounce of power it takes to win when the match is even." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Muhammad Ali The Greatest (1975)
item.description: "I am America. I am the part you won't recognize. But get used to me. Black, confident, cocky; my name, not yours; my religion, not yours; my goals, my own; get used to me. " -- Muhammad Ali The Greatest (1975)

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "If I didn't define myself for myself, I would be crunched into other people's fantasies for me and eaten alive." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "and when we speak we are afraid our words will not be heard nor welcomed but when we are silent we are still afraid So it is better to speak remembering we were never meant to survive" -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "I have come to believe over and over again that what is most important to me must be spoken, made verbal and shared, even at the risk of having it bruised or misunderstood." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "The master's tools will never dismantle the master's house" -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "My silences had not protected me. Your silence will not protect you. But for every real word spoken, for every attempt I had ever made to speak those truths for which I am still seeking, I had made contact with other women while we examined the words to fit a world in which we all believed, bridging our differences." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "Poetry is the way we help give name to the nameless so it can be thought." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Audre Lorde
item.description: "The quality of light by which we scrutinize our lives has direct bearing upon the product which we live, and upon the changes which we hope to bring about through those lives." -- Audre Lorde

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Saidiya V. Hartman
item.description: "Every generation confronts the task of choosing its past. Inheritances are chosen as much as they are passed on. The past depends less on 'what happened then' than on the desires and discontents of the present. Strivings and failures shape the stories we tell. What we recall has as much to do with the terrible things we hope to avoid as with the good life for which we yearn. But when does one decide to stop looking to the past and instead conceive of a new order? When is it time to dream of another country or to embrace other strangers as allies or to make an opening, an overture, where there is none? When is it clear that the old life is over, a new one has begun, and there is no looking back? From the holding cell was it possible to see beyond the end of the world and to imagine living and breathing again?" -- Saidiya V. Hartman

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "To love. To be loved. To never forget your own insignificance. To never get used to the unspeakable violence and the vulgar disparity of life around you. To seek joy in the saddest places. To pursue beauty to its lair. To never simplify what is complicated or complicate what is simple. To respect strength, never power. Above all, to watch. To try and understand. To never look away. And never, never to forget." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We have to continually be jumping off cliffs and developing our wings on the way down." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Shreya add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "When a couple has an argument nowadays they may think it s about money or power or sex or how to raise the kids or whatever. What they're really saying to each other, though without realizing it, is this: "You are not enough people!" -- Kurt Vonnegut
